item.title: CVE-2024-32567|2024-04-18T09:50:35.492Z -- Designinvento -- DirectoryPress
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Designinvento DirectoryPress allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects DirectoryPress: from n/a through 3.6.7.
